trans-unit.source: Contains values used as identifiers for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider" /> 做為識別項的值。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers are used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這些識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent fields in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>。

trans-unit.source: A control should have its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> set to `false` before allowing a call to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider.SetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> 應該設為 `true` ， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> 應該設為 `false` ，才能允許呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider.SetValue%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>。

trans-unit.source: The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified UI Automation element.
trans-unit.target: 模式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]傳遞至方法，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>從指定的使用者介面自動化項目擷取感興趣之控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>。
